products.title: Splash Blush Pink Panel Blind
products.description: Splash blush pink panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window. The light pink fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. At swift direct blinds, like all their made to measure products, these panel blinds are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Splash Moss Green Panel Blind
products.description: Splash moss green panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window. The light green, moisture-resistant fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Expressions Iron Grey Blackout Blind For Velux  Windows
products.description: A loft space neednt be boring. Add an expressions iron grey blind to your roof window and make it a modern pad. Bring in the chromes and blacks and let the scene work its magic. Alternatively, use this blind as a stylish alternative to neutral creams, working quietly amongst a loft space neednt be boring.

products.title: Expressions Dark Grey Blackout Blind For Velux  Windows
products.description: Take one fashionable grey shade, give it a blackout backing and make it so easy to install that itll be up in minutes. Thats just what youll be getting with this expressions dark grey blind. Designed to fit your velux window, it keeps the suns glare from your room as wel take one fashionable grey shade, give it a blackout backing and make it so easy to install that itll be up in minutes.

products.title: Expressions Light Taupe Blackout Blind For Velux  Windows
products.description: This soft and understated light taupe blind works wonderfully well in a neutral environment, offering subtle, delicate contrast. This beautiful design combines perfectly with the blackout fabric to maintain a warm and cosy environment free from the harsh glare of the sun.

products.title: Splash (Blackout), Code - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

Grey is the height of fashion these days crushed velvet in light, silvery tones - what could be better? products.title: Metis Solar Grey Neat Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Metis solar pleated fabric is available in a wide range of colours and features a silver solar speckled backing. Fantastic for conservatories, hot rooms like offices or even rooms with south-facing windows. Grey is one of their most popular colours, raising above cream as a firm favourite of designers, this grey metis blind is at home in either a rustic or modern setting. products.title: Rocco, Graphite - Roman Blind
products.description: Deep charcoal grey is home to an angular patterning in homely cream in the sumptuous rocco graphite. The main fabric has a plush chenille-feel texture, whilst the cream detailing is a loosely stitched thread with a soft shimmer. Hang the graphite in a contemporary yet luxurious living room. Match the walls to the detailing with a rich cream, and opt for dark grey carpets and patterned rugs. Include splashes of deep red or pretty plum in the form of cushions and throws for additional character and personality.
